content: until piece measures 18 - 22 inches from the base of the increase section on last round place markers every 34 sts around decreasing work the following 4 rounds until 16 sts remain ending after round 1 when needed switch to double pointed needles round 1 *k1 k2tog work sts in pattern until two before next marker ssk sm* repeat around round 2 work knits and purls as established round 3 *k1 p2tog work sts in pattern until two before next marker ssp sm* repeat around round 4 work knits and purls as established when 16 sts remain on next round *k1 p3tog* repeat from * to * 3 more times 8 sts remain break yarn and draw through the remaining 8 sts and weave in final end block lightly single layer hat instructions if you don t want to make the hat double layered cast on 136 sts a tubular cast on is recommended to create a nice edge work in k1 p1 ribbing until hat measures 9 - 11 inches from cast on edge and on last round place markers every 34 sts around follow decreasing and final instructions as written for the double layer hat pattern questions can be directed to witchinghourknits@gmail com this pattern is for personal use and not to be re-distributed © dora violet
